channel.title: Theme Options on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Theme Options on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
item.description: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>/ Guides / Theme Options / Breadcrumbs Enable Breadcrumbs linkBreadcrumb navigation is enabled by default1 and appears in the top right-hand corner of content pages above the page title. The Lotus Docs breadcrumb implementation functions with both multilingual and single-language sites. Structured Data linkThe breadcrumb navigation also auto-generates structured data for rich results to help enable search results that are more engaging to users. Here are the Breadcrumb Rich Results test results for this very page.
